Package group24.piazzapanic.game

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
      • group24.piazzapanic.game.Player
  • public class Player
extends com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
    The Player class encapsulates player data (position, velocity etc.), but does nothing itself.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  Player.facing
      The direction the player is facing.

      • GRID_WIDTH

        public static final double GRID_WIDTH
        How wide the player is in grid units. Applies to both Actor.width and Actor.height. Do not set to more than 1.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • TEXTURE_SCALE

        public static final float TEXTURE_SCALE
        Texture is scaled with this and GRID_WIDTH.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
